mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deu_se.FLIGHT_LIST (airplane_name, start_airport, dest_airport, via, identifier, status, start_date, end_date, airline_kor, first_seat_num, business_seat_num, economy_seat_num, sign) VALUES (#{airplane_name}, #{start_airport}, #{dest_airport}, #{via}, #{identifier}, #{status}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{airline_kor}, #{first_seat_num}, #{business_seat_num}, #{economy_seat_num},#{sign})
mapper.update: UPDATE deu_se.FLIGHT_LIST SET sign=TRUE WHERE identifier=#{identifier}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM deu_se.FLIGHT_LIST where airline_kor=#{airline_kor}
SELECT * FROM deu_se.FLIGHT_LIST where DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FOMRAT(#{start_date},'%Y-%m-%d');
